title: Baked Fish Sandwiches
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Step 2: Place fish fillets in a shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with garlic, then squeeze lemon juice over the top. Dot with butter.
Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes.
Step 4: Spread steak sauce on the cut-side of the bottoms of buns. Top each with fish, then drizzle with ranch dressing. Cover with top buns to serve.
